Summary Evans has worked for such major players in the IT industry as General Electric, IBM, and Covad Communications. His many job titles include: Field Service Representative, Help Desk Technician, Network Engineer, Network Monitoring Specialist and many more. 
 
Evans made the jump into management in 1998 when he became Director of Technical Support for Word Records, a division of Gaylord Entertainment. Since then, he has been a Senior Manager of Network Activations for Bluestar Communications, a General Manager for Vivo Communications, a Manager with ISDN.Net, a Senior IT Advisor with Metropolitan Government of Nashville, TN, and more. 
 
In 2001, Evans was introduced to professional project management and was drawn to the organization and efficiency of the PMBOK methodology. Since then, he has been involved in projects in roles ranging from Executive Sponsor to Project Manager and has been pursuing project management as his primary career role ever since. Recently Evans became certified in IT Infrastructure Library (ITIL) Foundations and received his Project Management Professional (PMP) certification from the Project Management Institute. 
 
Most recently, Evans has worked in the ITSM/ITAM arena as a Senior Consultant for Numara Software, BMC Software, and RightStar Systems, Business Analyst for BMC, Director of Professional Services for Consultis of Tampa. 
 
Evans received his BS degree from Middle Tennessee State University and is currently employed as Director of Service and Support for EasyVista, a leading, global provider of cloud based IT Service Management, Asset Lifecycle Management, and Organizational Service Management solutions for the large enterprise. Specialties:Senior level manager, 40+ employees. Project manager, business process design. Start up, telecom, computer hardware, Internet. EDI, Sterling Commerce Gentran. Helpdesk management, technical. A+ & Novell Certified. Software experience. Win & Unix networking. 3270, 5250, TCP/IP, DNS, Cisco, Lucent. VisualBASIC, Access, SQL, ColdFusion, HTML, C, Unix, Perl. Sales, sales management. Own ISP, web hosting, site design, email solutions, spam and virus filtering, custom programming, IT consulting..
